Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into rework_search_bar

replies.bodyText: Originally the idea about the advanced hints options was to make it reusable for other hints as well. But in fact, it has only been used also for another (somewhat silly) hint in the network tab in the preferences dialog. So im not sure about this... Maybe in the future, we could evolve that feature to some annoying tip of the day feature? 😉
